title.native: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。
title.romaji: One Room, Hi Atari Futsuu, Tenshi Tsuki.
title.english: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included

description:
After a long day, high schooler Shintarou Tokumitsu’s plans for relaxing in his studio apartment take a turn when he discovers an angel on his balcony. The divine girl, Towa, reveals she’s there to study humanity, and yet despite his skepticism, he agrees to put her up. Prepare for the most heavenly and high jinks roommate experience of all time!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使
หนึ่งห้อง สองหัวใจ อุ่นไอรัก

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.

**[Website (artist page)]([TRY TONE LABO](http://star-jam.com/trytonelabo/creator/shunsuke-takizawa)**

**Shunsuke Takizawa** is a Japanese composer and arranger working under company starJam, as a creator for the project [TRY TONE LABO](http://star-jam.com/trytonelabo)

**Height:** 150 cm

[Website](http://www.ogurayui.jp) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ogurayui-0815) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/OY_A_Official) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/yui_ogura_815) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjoIKN4CybsJyv0pWwAUJ5w) | [LINE](https://lineblog.me/ogurayui) | [Clare Voice](http://clare-voice.co.jp/talent) | [YuiKaori](http://www.yuikaori.info) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27839.html) | [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%80%89%E5%94%AF) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yui_ogura_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@yui_ogura_offcial)

Not to be confused with [Yui Ogura (小倉結衣)](https://anilist.co/staff/123771).

Yui Ogura is an idol, actress, singer and voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with Clare Voice. She is one of four members in Team Dekaris along with Kaori Ishihara, Arisa Noto, and Maho Matsunaga. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Kaori Ishihara](https://anilist.co/staff/105217/) before the group disbanded in 2017. She is a former member of the seiyuu group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177/), which was formed in 2011 and composed of the same members of Team Dekaris. Ogura's debut single "Raise" was released on July 18, 2012. She graduated from the group in April 2013.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Amatsukaze - Kancolle (VG)
- Taigei/Ryuuhou - Kancolle (VG)
- Harbour Princess - Kancolle (VG)
- Isolated Island Demon - Kancolle (VG)

__Non-anime staff credits:__

**Height:** 150 cm
